Producer: Guillaume de Seille, Natalya Mokritskaya, Mila Rozanova, Maria Lavnikovich, Ulyana Saveleva, Bénédicte Thomas
Production Co: New People Film Company, Arizona Films
Synopsis: Middle-aged zoo worker Natasha lives with her mother in a small coastal town. She feels stuck in a life that holds no surprises, until one day she grows a tail.
Title: Zoology
